QuestData.Title: Blood Ritual
QuestData.Description: Our goal is to find the demon hunter, Loramus Thalipedes. Let me know when you are ready to begin the blood ritual, and then stand back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Bloodmage Lynnore to begin the blood ritual.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bloodmage Lynnore at the Dreadmaul Furnace in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.CompletionText: The ritual is not yet complete.
QuestData.RewardText: The blood ritual was a success; I can clearly see where Loramus is right now. That is, I can see where the pieces of his body lie...
